name: ChipedIn
description: Our platform provides an innovative solution by combining crowdfunding and personal shopper services. We enable communities to pool their contributions towards desired, high-value gifts, effectively minimizing returns and elevating the gifting experience.
one_liner: Our platform provides an innovative solution by combining crowdfunding and personal shopper services. We enable communities to pool their contributions towards desired, high-value gifts, effectively minimizing returns and elevating the gifting experience.
location: New York City, New York, United States
